name: Goodbye Time Traveler
description:
Goodbye Time Traveler is a very heart-driven time-travel game.

Meet the weirdly nameless main character. A 21 years old cynical college student living a boring pathetic life except for the fact that he is cursed with strange phenomena. A phenomena that cause him to ''Time skip''  with no memories of what happened ...

Discover the horrible truth of the universe, and fight for what you believe is right.

Whether you guide the world to salvation or destruction is all up to ''YOU".

Only ''YOU'' can decide the fate of the world and every world and timeline out there ...

(Game can be played in your browser  -No Download is Needed- )

PS: A patch updating the game and fixing spelling and grammar issues is being uploaded at the moment, please excuse any spelling mistakes in the meantime.
